code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ButtonURL=_ref=>{let{recipeId}=_ref;const[url,setUrl]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchRecipeUrl=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://api.spoonacular.com/recipes/".concat(recipeId,"/information?apiKey=").concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_RECIP_BOOK_KEY));setUrl(response.data.sourceUrl);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching recipe URL:",error);}};if(recipeId){fetchRecipeUrl();}},[recipeId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"Full Instruction"})});};export default ButtonURL;
